channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Adminify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Adminify

item.title: CVE-2023-4060|2024-08-02T07:17:11.406Z -- unknown -- wp%20adminify
item.description: The WP Adminify WordPress plugin before 3.1.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
